name: Docker
notes: Docker is a platform for containerizing applications.

name: Kubernetes (kubectl)
notes: kubectl is the command-line tool for interacting with Kubernetes clusters.

name: Minikube
notes: Minikube allows you to run a local Kubernetes cluster.

name: Helm
notes: Helm is a package manager for Kubernetes.

name: Terraform
notes: Terraform is an Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tool.

name: Ansible
notes: Ansible is an open-source automation tool for configuration management and application deployment.

name: Jenkins
notes: Jenkins is an automation server for building, testing, and deploying applications.

name: Git
notes: Git is a distributed version control system for source code management.

name: GitHub CLI (gh)
notes: GitHub CLI provides a command-line interface for interacting with GitHub.

name: AWS CLI
notes: AWS CLI is a unified tool to manage AWS services from the command line.

name: Azure CLI
notes: Azure CLI is a command-line tool to manage Azure resources.

name: Google Cloud SDK
notes: Google Cloud SDK provides tools to interact with Google Cloud resources.

name: Prometheus
notes: Prometheus is a monitoring and alerting toolkit.

name: Grafana
notes: Grafana is a visualization tool for monitoring and observability.

name: ngrok
notes: ngrok exposes local servers to the internet for testing.

name: k9s
notes: k9s is a terminal UI for managing Kubernetes clusters.

name: Vault
notes: Vault is a tool for securely managing secrets and access to sensitive data.

name: Consul
notes: Consul is a service mesh solution for connecting and securing applications.

name: Postman
notes: Postman is an API testing tool.

name: nvm
notes: nvm is a version manager for Node.js.

name: jq
notes: jq is a lightweight command-line JSON processor.

name: HTTPie
notes: HTTPie is a user-friendly HTTP client for the terminal.

name: asciinema
notes: asciinema records and shares terminal sessions.

name: Vegeta
notes: Vegeta is a load testing tool for HTTP services.

name: K6
notes: K6 is a performance testing tool for modern web apps.
